minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I think we need to address both technology infrastructure & scaling and product demo & technical reviews today.

minutes.speaker: Rohan Mehta
minutes.text: Have you tried this approach for POC? It worked for us.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: The thing is... our training data is showing 94% accuracy, and the burn rate is improving.

minutes.speaker: Rohan Mehta
minutes.text: The MRR struggle is real for all of us in insurtech.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: The runway extension timeline is tight, but we're confident about product-market fit.

minutes.speaker: Rohan Mehta
minutes.text: The LTV struggle is real for all of us in insurtech.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I understand the concerns about ARR, but our product-market fit metrics are strong.

minutes.speaker: Rohan Mehta
minutes.text: Have you tried this approach for user adoption? It worked for us.
